_template_info.name: GST Letter of Undertaking (LUT)
_template_info.description: Letter of Undertaking for export without payment of IGST
notes: LUT allows exporters to export goods/services without paying IGST
Must be filed on GST portal before first export
Separate LUT required for goods and services

undertaking_text:
I/We hereby undertake that:
1. I/We shall export the goods/services without payment of integrated tax under bond or Letter of Undertaking.
2. I/We shall comply with the provisions of the Central Goods and Services Tax Act, 2017 and the rules made thereunder.
3. I/We shall furnish all documents as prescribed under the said Act and rules.
4. I/We accept that in case of contravention of any of the above, I/We shall be liable to penalty as prescribed under the Act.
5. I/We shall execute a bond in case required by the jurisdictional Commissioner.
declaration: I/We hereby solemnly affirm and declare that the information given herein above is true and correct to the best of my/our knowledge and belief and nothing has been concealed therefrom.
